enabled.description: Enable CockroachDB. YugabyteDB xor CockroachDB should be enabled (only one at at time, at least one).

tag.description: Version tag of the CockroachDB image. Until DSS v0.16, the recommended CockroachDB version is `v21.2.7`. From DSS v0.17, the recommended CockroachDB version is `v24.1.3`.

join.description: List of already-existing CockroachDB instances. If empty, the chart will automatically discover the internal nodes. If set to join a DSS Region and other DSS instance, please add the addresses of the statefulset's pod as well.

locality.description: Locality attribute for this deployment. Example: zone=example

args.description:
Additional argument passed to the statefulset pod command. In the context of the dss deployment it requires the following arguments:
 `--locality-advertise-addr=zone=example@$(hostname -f)`
`--advertise-addr=${HOSTNAME##*-}.db.example.com`

storageClass.description: Storage class depending on your cloud provider.

enabled.description: Enable YugabyteDB. YugabyteDB xor CockroachDB should be enabled (only one at at time, at least one).

placement_cloud.description: Name of the cloud where instances are deployed, in a recommended deployment should be set to 'dss'

placement_region.description: Name of the region where instances are deployed, in a recommended deployment should be set to your organization's name

placement_zone.description: Name of the zone where instances are deployed, in a recommended deployment should be set to 'zone'

masterAddresses.description: A comma-separated list of master addresses to use. For a local cluster, you can omit it to use the default values, if you join an existing cluster you need to set it the list of public addresses of all master yugabyte nodes

ip.description: Public ip or cloud resource name.

image.description: Image of the DSS. Please note that the usage of the `latest` tag is discouraged to prevent accidental upgrades in case of restart. Example: `docker.io/interuss/dss:v0.15.0`. Official image releases: https://hub.docker.com/r/interuss/dss/tags

hostname.description: Public hostname of the dss. Example: dss.example.com

publicEndpoint.description: Public endpoint of the dss. Example: https://dss.example.com. Only for dss version >= 0.21.0, otherwise left this value empty.
